participant_1.name: Luca
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, Luca enjoys expressing himself through music and has a love for nature.
participant_1.background: I went hiking and swimming last time I was on vacation. My parents have always been there for me and supported my dreams. I enjoy John Grisham movies, but not his books. I am Italian American. I own 9 guitars.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Sophie is outgoing and ambitious, with a passion for the arts and a sweet tooth for gummy worms.
participant_2.background: I've been in a relationship for 5 years, but I feel like I don't measure up to my partner's standards. I tried to make it as an actor when I was younger. I can't get enough gummy worms to satisfy my sweet tooth. I wake up early to practice my music before my sister and niece and nephew wake up. I love watching sitcoms on television.

content.text: What's up? How's your day going?
It's going good! I just got back from a run and now I'm watching some sitcoms.
Oh that sounds fun! I've been wanting to go hiking but I haven't had a chance yet.
Hiking is really fun! I love being in nature.
Me too! I feel like it really clears my head.
I totally agree! What do you do for work?
I'm a musician. I play the guitar and I write songs.
That's awesome! I love music. I used to try to be an actor when I was younger.
I was in a few plays in high school but I never really got any good roles.
That's still really cool! I've always wanted to try acting but I'm too shy.
You should give it a try! It's really fun.
I might have to! Thanks for the encouragement.
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about music and acting.
